name: Itemwise Availability
query:
select 
tb.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:300",
sum(coalesce(tb.actual_qty,0)) as "Available:Float:120", 
sum(coalesce(sit.qty,0))  as "Booked:Float:120" 
from `tabBin` as tb
LEFT JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item` as sit 
ON sit.item_code = tb.item_code
and sit.parent in (select name from `tabSales Invoice` where docstatus = 1 and party_date_cf=%(as_on_date)s)
group by tb.item_code
